name: Sticky Buns
description: Sweet cinnamon rolls baked in a brown sugar, butter, and pecan caramel, then inverted to reveal the sticky topping.

ingredients.item: Brown sugar (pinch about a inch worth out of the bag of brown sugar)

instructions: grease square glass dish with butter
roll out dough with no flour on counter (approx 7 inches wide)
sprinkle dough with cinnamon sugar and roll up lengthwise. use flour on fingertips to prevent sticking
cut dough in half, in half again and then cut those into threes (12 pieces total)
put butter patties (8-12 patties), pecans, and brown sugar on the bottom of the dish

put the rolls of dough on top of the sugar/butter/pecans (4x3 rows) and sprinkle the top with cinnamon sugar. Let sit (you can cover it and see if that works faster) so the dough can rise to twice the original size
bake at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until the dough is browned
flip upside down onto foil immediately and put onto cooling rack
